content: Investments Asked by Kai XinAsked on 12 Nov 2018Is there a way to find out how much is your SSB value without redeeming it?1 answerAnswerBump1

Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Go to this page to calculate the value.http://www.sgs.gov.sg/savingsbonds/Your-SSB/Calculator.aspxSelect your tranche, then the tab "If you redeem early"Add me on facebook if u require further financial advice.1 comment2
